descriptionlist.description: Another collection of brilliant, high definition video wallpapers for vWallpaper2.

Configuration:
1) Install the above tweak & open vWallpapers2
2) Tap "Manage current theme"
3) Enable "LOCKSCREEN:VIDEO" or "SPRINGBOARD:VIDEO"
4) Tap "Settings" for either one
5) Select among the installed vPack wallpapers for your lock screen or springboard

changelog.change: Five high definition, video wallpapers for vWallpaper2
